Therapy Services

Compassionate, Professional Support for Your Mental Health Journey

Explore our range of therapy services designed to help you overcome challenges, develop coping strategies, and achieve emotional well-being.

Book a Consultation

Personalized Therapy for Every Need

Each person's journey is unique. I offer a variety of therapeutic approaches tailored to address your specific concerns and help you achieve your personal goals.

Individual Therapy

One-on-one sessions tailored to your unique needs and goals

Duration: 50 minutes
Fee: $150 per session

Key Benefits:

  • Personalized treatment approach
  • Confidential and judgment-free environment
  • Evidence-based therapeutic techniques
Learn More

Anxiety & Stress Management

Learn effective strategies to manage anxiety and reduce stress

Duration: 50 minutes
Fee: $150 per session

Key Benefits:

  • Identify and understand anxiety triggers
  • Learn practical coping techniques
  • Develop mindfulness and relaxation skills
Learn More

Depression Treatment

Evidence-based approaches to overcome depression and improve mood

Duration: 50 minutes
Fee: $150 per session

Key Benefits:

  • Cognitive-behavioral therapy techniques
  • Mood tracking and management
  • Building healthy habits and routines
Learn More

Life Transitions & Adjustment

Navigate major life changes with support and guidance

Duration: 50 minutes
Fee: $150 per session

Key Benefits:

  • Process emotions related to change
  • Develop adaptation strategies
  • Find meaning in transitions
Learn More

Relationship Issues

Improve communication and resolve relationship challenges

Duration: 50 minutes
Fee: $150 per session

Key Benefits:

  • Improve communication skills
  • Understand relationship patterns
  • Set healthy boundaries
Learn More

Insurance and Payment

Insurance

I am currently an out-of-network provider. I can provide you with a superbill that you can submit to your insurance company for potential reimbursement.

Please check with your insurance provider about your out-of-network mental health benefits before scheduling.

Payment Options

Payment is due at the time of service. I accept:

  • Credit/Debit Cards
  • HSA/FSA Cards
  • Cash or Check

Take the first step towards better mental health. Schedule your initial consultation today and let's discuss how I can support you.
